GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: returns one article when given a valid id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns an array of comments when given a valid id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns the comment that has been added to the article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the vote count in an article with a valid id, works for both positive and negative integers
